products.name: Playstation 5
products.description: Experience lightning fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers and 3D Audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation® games.

products.name: Playstation 4
products.description: Sleek and streamlined, the PlayStation 4 Slim opens the door to a world of immersive gaming and top-tier entertainment. Enjoy blockbuster storytelling presented in stunning Full HD 1080p and an online library full of exclusive content tailor-made for the PS4. Stream movies, tap into your favourite apps, and connect with your friends to embark on epic adventures together.

products.name: IPhone 11 Pro
products.description: A transformative triple‑camera system that adds tons of capability without complexity. An unprecedented leap in battery life. And a mind‑blowing chip that doubles down on machine learning and pushes the boundaries of what a smartphone can do. Welcome to the first iPhone powerful enough to be called Pro

products.name: Insignia 5.0 Cu. Ft. Chest Freezer (NS-CZ50WH0-C) - White
products.description: Experience lightning fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers and 3D Audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation® games.

products.name: Insignia Air Fryer - 4.8L/5.1QT - Stainless Steel
products.description: Fry up chicken, fries, appetizers, and other family favourites in the 4.8L Insignia air fryer. This oil-free fryer delivers crispy, golden brown results with 80% less fat than deep frying. It fries foods quickly and efficiently to get dinner on the table sooner, perfect for weeknight meals or weekend snacks.

products.name: Apple iPhone X 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray
products.description: iPhone X features an all-screen design with a 5.8-inch Super Retina HD display with HDR and True Tone. Designed with the most durable glass ever in a smartphone and a surgical-grade stainless steel band. Charges wirelessly (charging mat sold separately). Face ID lets you unlock and use Apple Pay with just a glance. Supports augmented reality experiences in games and apps. With iPhone X, the next era of iPhone has begun.
